thread.title: SelectAccount Expands National Sales Team into Southwest Region
thread.title_full: SelectAccount Expands National Sales Team into Southwest Region - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: SelectAccount Expands National Sales Team into Southwest Region
text:
Krystal Clarkson joins SelectAccount as expert for employer cost containment strategies in Southwest
Eagan, MN (PRWEB) October 09, 2015
SelectAccount , a leading provider of medical spending accounts including HSA, FSA, HRA and VEBA accounts, announces their national expansion of its sales team. Krystal Clarkson joins the team as National Sales Executive covering Arkansas, Louisiana, New Mexico, Oklahoma and Texas.
Krystal Clarkson brings over 10 years of experience with client relationship management and providing complex employer solutions in the consulting firm and provider capacities. Having served in leadership roles for a Dallas, TX headquartered employee benefits consulting firm as well as a regional corporate wellness provider, her experience has fostered a deep knowledge and understanding of the rapidly changing health care landscape. Krystal remains dedicated to growing her knowledge and is energetically connected with industry professionals through memberships with the Southwest Benefits Association, Worldwide Employee Benefits Network and local Society for Human Resource Professionals chapters and holds a General Lines Life, Accident and Health license. Krystal is also a member of the American Heart Association, Go Red for Women Passion Committee and a Community Ambassador.
“I am thrilled to be joining SelectAccount during such an exciting time in the company’s growth. I look forward to leveraging my industry knowledge and regional market network to drive expansion initiatives in the Southwest at a time when medical spending accounts paired with consumerism tools that encourage individuals to more wisely manager their health care expenses are so vital to sustainable health care solutions,” said Krystal Clarkson.
“We are very excited to welcome Krystal to the SelectAccount team. Her passion, intuition and extensive knowledge will help us foster valuable relationships with distribution partners to expand our national reach. Krystal joins SelectAccount during an exciting period as constant evolution in the health care industry demands increased consumer engagement from individuals,” said David Cantu, Vice President of Marketing, Sales and Public Relations of SelectAccount.
About SelectAccount
SelectAccount has been driving innovation in medical savings administration for over 25 years. They offer a full suite of tax-advantaged solutions – HSA, HRA, FSA, VEBA, transportation and dependent care accounts – as well as WalletDoc consumer tools to meet clients’ changing needs as they plan for their health care expenditures. They are one of the leading medical savings administrators in the country managing more than half a billion dollars in consumer medical account savings assets integrated with numerous partner data exchange connections, serving 7,000 employers with account holders in all 50 states. MII Life, Inc., d.b.a. SelectAccount has been approved by the U.S. Department of Treasury as a non-bank HSA Trustee. SelectAccount is headquartered in Eagan, Minnesota with an office located in Chicago, Illinois and Dallas, Texas. Visit http://www.SelectAccount.com to learn more.
